text: 4.7 Jon 3.27, Lom 12.6, Jem 1.17, 1 Pi 4.10 Tɨtay dɨl? An nɨbop aglek bɨawl okok mɨdebɨm? Nɨbi tap teplep olap dɨpɨm ak pen, God yɨl ma dɨpɨm akaŋ? Nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl apin, God nokom tap anɨb okok nɨbop ñek dɨ mɨdebɨm. Ne nokom ñub, anɨb ak taynen yɨb nɨbi ke dad aplanɨl apɨm, Chɨn binɨb nɨgtep gɨl, gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨl tap anɨb okok dɨpun apɨm?
